headline: A Look At 3M (MMM) Valuation As Shares Trade Near An Indicated 7% Intrinsic Discount
summary: 3M (MMM) has drawn investor attention after recent trading, with the stock closing at $161.82 and mixed short term returns, including a slight move over the past week and a decline over the past month. See our latest analysis for 3M. Beyond the latest move, 3M’s 90 day share price return of 4.18% sits against a flat year to date share price return. Its 1 year total shareholder return of 26.54% and 3 year total shareholder return of 70.65% point to stronger gains over a longer holding...
